Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameState

  • public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds the internal state of the game. It is instantiated by ZombieHouseGameMain. This class contains methods necessary for moving zombies, making zombie decisions, triggering sounds moving the player's position on the floorPlan, instantiating and terminating thread worker classes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameState(int level)
      Constructor takes an integer between 1 and 5 inclusive for the level number.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameState

        public GameState(int level)
        Constructor takes an integer between 1 and 5 inclusive for the level number. The attributes are set at different values for each level.
        Parameters:
        level - The current level of the game

      • movePlayer

        public boolean movePlayer(int currentRow,
                          int currentCol,
                          int nextRow,
                          int nextCol)
        This method is used to move the player position on the floor plan.
        Parameters:
        currentRow - The current player position row
        currentCol - The current player position col
        nextRow - The prospective player position row
        nextCol - The prospective player position col
        Returns:
        true if the player successfully changed position

      • initializeBackup

        public void initializeBackup(GameState game,
                             GameState backup)
        This method is used to make a backup of the current GameState object in case the player dies.
        Parameters:
        game - The current GameState
        backup - The backup GameState

      • playGrowl

        public void playGrowl(double distance)
        This method is used to trigger growl sounds in the zombieSoundWorkers
        Parameters:
        distance - Euclidean distance from zombie to player
